name: Starlight Brigade
description:
WASD to move. 

LMB/Space to fire.

RMB/F to call on the Starlight Brigade. 

Starlight Brigade is a song by TWRP and Dan Avidan  from TWRP's latest album, Together Through Time. This game is a 48hr GameJam by Matthew Phillips and Jesse Lathey inspired by this fantastic track. Thank you SO MUCH to TWRP and Dan for being a musical inspiration that transcends time and space. General credits follow:

Starlight Brigade (song and title) - TWRP, Dan Avidan

Music - Jesse Lathey (covering TWRP)

Engine/Mechanics - Matthew Phillips

AI/Mechanics - Jesse Lathey

Artwork - Jesse Lathey

Sound Effects -  ofuscapreto, wheatley-hlo, sharesynth, veiler, iwiploppenisse, bubaproducer, senitiel, daycraftms, davidsraba, morganpurkis via Freesound.org

Vocals - Matthew Phillips

Audio Processing - Matthew Phillips via dblue_crusher in Audacity

High Scores - Public Radio Alliance

This project is a prototype and should not be monetized.
